titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Harrison Moore
CWG13717

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To Harrison Moore Dr.

row.cell: (75) Seventy five cord Wood at one Dollar per cord
For use 2d & 3d Battalions 14th Regt Ky Vol Cavalry

p.note:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Adjt Genl Ky Vols

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the articles were furnished as stated; and that they were a necessary for the public service.

Jones A Crawford
Lt & A. Q. M 2 & 3 Batt 14 Ky Cav

Received at Frankfort on, the 20th of March, 1863, of John W Finnell, Quarter-master Adjutant General Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Seventy five -- Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

39No 41
NO. 12.
No. 63 Abstract B A Qr. 186
Harrison Moore
Dollars 7500/100
Paid March 20th 1863
allowed Aug 8. 1863
J212
J 10 J W F
39
